title: UAE Vice President Sheikh Mansour : A look at his net worth and Manchester City empire | World News
body_text:
- News
- World News
- Middle East News
- UAE Vice President Sheikh Mansour: A look at his net worth and Manchester City empire
Trending
Sheikh Mansour bin Zayed Al Nahyan, UAE Vice President and Deputy Prime Minister, is a billionaire royal with an estimated net worth of $30 billion. Owner of Manchester City and City Football Group, his empire spans sports, finance, real estate, and luxury assets. A key political figure, he oversees major investments, sovereign wealth funds, and strengthens UAE’s global influence through business and diplomacy.
Sheikh Mansour bin Zayed Al Nahyan is a name that commands attention in both political and business circles. As a member of the UAE’s ruling family, a global investor, and the owner of Manchester City Football Club, Mansour has built an empire that spans finance, sports, and real estate. His journey from Abu Dhabi royalty to international influence reflects the intersection of wealth, politics, and ambition in the modern Middle East.
